replies.body:
>This is the ONLY reason he got perm-banned, and tbh I dont think this is fair?

Bans escalate. If this caused a permanent ban, then I imagine the account has been punished before. If you don't show proper reform in between punishments, the next punishment will escalate according to the following list:

* 10-game chat restriction.
* 25-game chat restriction.
* 14-day ban.
* Permanent ban.

This behavior is definitely punishable, and, depending on the history of the account, that could mean this results in a justified permanent ban.

>The reason that i'm really salty about it is that like everybody gets chatristrictions,

This is actually quite inaccurate. Most players (I believe it was at least 80%-85%, but I don't have my source handy) never get *any* punishment. Most players who *get* a chat restriction never get *another* punishment.

Sooooo you got punished before (I assume, I would be surprised if you hadn't) and yet, you continue to be toxic af?
Clearly you didn't learn a thing. Permaban justified, glad you're off the Rift.

There are 4 tiers of punishment;

1. 10 game chat restriction 
2. 25 game chat restriction 
3. 14-day ban
4. Permaban

The system punishes people based on consistency x severity.  So someone that is mildly toxic for 1000 games will likely have the same punishment as another whom told others to kys for 2 games.

He likely wasn't just banned for this game alone. The reform card shows 1-5 recent games as examples of unacceptable behavior.

When your bf had a 14-day ban, it was clearly written in the reform card that his next punishment would be a permaban.
